nodes.text: Vekker was a male Quarren Vigo of Black Sun during Prince Xizor's reign. Described by Xizor as being content with the status quo, he had no ambition to rise any higher within the organization. He was killed in the intercenine crime wars instigated by Savan in 4 ABY.
Vekker was named after a predatory species native to Dac.
